sentences.en: A complete tenement block was burnt to the ground.
sentences.cn: 整幢公寓大楼被付之一炬。

sentences.en: A few colourful dragon - flies even carne to flit over the puddles in the tenement yard.
sentences.cn: 连大杂院里的水坑上也来了几个各色的蜻蜓.

sentences.en: Although he was born in a Glasgow tenement, he is now very rich.
sentences.cn: 尽管他出生在格拉斯哥贫民区的一座楼房里, 现在却很富有.

sentences.en: Are written on the subway walls and tenement halls.
sentences.cn: 都已写在地铁的墙上和房屋的大厅里.

sentences.en: Are written the subway walls & tenement halls.
sentences.cn: 都被写在地铁的墙上 及 出租公寓的走廊上.

sentences.en: Are written the subway walls and tenement halls ". "
sentences.cn: 已被写在地铁的墙上以及出租公寓的走廊上.

sentences.en: He drove to the tenement and knocked on Igace's door.
sentences.cn: 他把车子开到公寓大楼,叩响伊格内斯的房门.

sentences.en: He lives in a tenement block.
sentences.cn: 他住在一家廉价公寓楼里.

sentences.en: In the dimly lit hall of one Charlestown tenement he encountered David Powers.
sentences.cn: 他在查尔斯敦一幢楼房的灯光暗淡的大厅里遇见了戴维·鲍尔斯.

sentences.en: Never would she escape from this tenement courtyard!
sentences.cn: 她永远逃不出这个大杂院去!

sentences.en: Our products are widely used in bathroom and kitchen of villa, hotel and tenement.
sentences.cn: 公司所生产的产品广泛的应用于家庭、宾馆、别墅等地方.

sentences.en: She lived in that gloomy tenement a place not fit for swine.
sentences.cn: 她就住在那幢阴暗的、连猪也不宜住的公寓里.

sentences.en: The particulars of individual tenement account attached or detached are set out in the list overleaf.
sentences.cn: 新增或分拆在综合帐目内的个别物业帐目资料详列于背面的附表内.

sentences.en: Tigress felt very smug in a tenement yard like this.
sentences.cn: 就是在个这样的杂院里,虎妞觉得很得意.

trans.tran_en: a large building divided into apartments, especially in the poorer areas of a city
